name: GRIDSTEP
description:
Gameplay

Survive on a hazardous grid, avoiding the dangerous red cells while trying to earn as many points as possible. The red cells will kill you if you are standing on one when a round ends. Earn points each round and gain bonus points by collecting the green circle. Increase your bonus points multiplier by continually collecting bonus points and maintaining a combo. The higher your combo, the more points you earn. Unlock powerups in the shop and equip up to 3 at once in your loadout.

Features
  • Normal & Hard difficulties
  • Standard & Endless mode
  • Unlockable powerups
  • Unlockable themes & players
Controls
  • WASD/Arrow keys: Move
  • Space: Start Game/Upgrade Powerup
  • L-Shift : Time Warp (if equipped)
  • L-Click : Blink (if equipped)

Standard Mode:

    • Survive 5 stages of 10 rounds each for a total of 50 rounds
    • Upgrade one equipped powerup at the end of each stage
    • Achieve a Perfect Clear bonus for grabbing all of the bonus points in a stage
    • Earn more points with no powerups equipped

Endless Mode:

    • Infinite rounds
    • No powerup upgrades
    • Earn more points with no powerups equipped
